BAC0.core.devices package¶

Submodules¶

BAC0.core.devices.Device module¶

class BAC0.core.devices.Device.Device(addr, devId, network)¶

Bases: object

Bacnet device This class represents a controller. When defined, it allows the use of read, write, sim, release functions to communicate with the device on the network

auto(args)¶

Release the override on the output (Write null on point at priority 8)

Parameters:args – (str) pointName value (both info in same string)
buildPointList()¶

Read all points of the device and creates a dataframe (Pandas) to store the list and allow quick access. This list will be used to access variables based on point name

default(args)¶

Write to relinquish default value of a point of a device

Parameters:args – (str) pointName value (both info in same string)
get(name)¶

Get a point based on its name

Parameters:name – (str) pointName
Returns:(Point) the point (can be Numeric, Boolean or Enum)
ovr(args)¶

Override the output (Make manual operator command on point at priority 8)

Parameters:args – (str) pointName value (both info in same string)
read(args)¶

Read a point from a device

Parameters:args – point name
Returns:value read
release(args)¶

Release points Will write to out_of_service property (false) The controller will take control back of the presentValue

Parameters:args – (str) pointName
releaseAllSim()¶

Release all points stored in the self.simPoints variable Will write to out_of_service property (false) The controller will take control back of the presentValue

sim(args)¶

Simulate a value Will write to out_of_service property (true) Will then write the presentValue so the controller will use that value The point name will be added to the list of simulated points (self.simPoints)

Parameters:args – (str) pointName value (both info in same string)
write(args)¶

Write to present value of a point of a device

Parameters:args – (str) pointName value (both info in same string)
